TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

span.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持此控件模式的控件示例包括顶级应用程序窗口[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)]子窗口、 模式对话框和气球状帮助窗口。Examples of controls that support this control pattern include top-level application windows, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] child windows, modal dialogs and balloon help windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个包含已缓存的结构 [！控件模式的 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，对返回的自动化元素的子代的根并符合一组属性条件的集合的函数传递根元素。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: Attempts to close the current window.

span.span: Attempts to close the current window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在拆分窗格控件上调用，此方法会关闭窗格，并删除关联的拆分。When called on a split pane control, this method will close the pane and remove the associated split. 此方法也可能关闭具体取决于实现的所有其他窗格。This method may also close all other panes depending on implementation. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自并随后用于关闭。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is subsequently used to close the . [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.

span.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.

exception.span: When the control is no longer available.

span.span: When the control is no longer available.

value.span: 一个包含当前结构 [！控件模式的 INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果获得使用，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用来获取一个属性，以前使用指定的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WaitForInputIdle(int32 milliseconds) cil managed
Public Function WaitForInputIdle (milliseconds As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.

span.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.
The maximum is .

summary.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

span.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

returns.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

span.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常与的处理结合使用。This method is typically used in conjunction with the handling of a . 实现都依赖于基础的应用程序框架;因此，此方法可能会返回一段时间后窗口可供用户输入。The implementation is dependent on the underlying application framework; therefore this method may return some time after the window is ready for user input. 调用的代码不应依赖于此方法可确定窗口进入空闲状态的确切时间。The calling code should not rely on this method to ascertain exactly when the window has become idle. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自并使用以确认元素都可以用于在合理的时间内的用户交互。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and uses to confirm the element is ready for user interaction within a reasonable amount of time. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

exception.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

span.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent WindowClosedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly WindowClosedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序可能需要侦听从缓存的对象，因为从删除窗口[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]控制正在关闭时将立即视图结构。A client application may need to listen for from a cached object since a window is removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] control view structure immediately upon being closed. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，声明事件侦听器和为指定委托和事件。In the following example, event listeners are declared and an delegate is specified for and events. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
